TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SecurityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class SecurityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type SecurityPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Describes a set of security permissions applied to code.

span.span: Describes a set of security permissions applied to code.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa permissão usa o enumeração.This permission uses the enumeration. Os valores dessa enumeração podem ser encontrados em sua documentação.The values for this enumeration can be found in its documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Uma cópia de uma permissão representa o mesmo acesso a recursos como a permissão original.A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Bits de permissão individuais podem ser determinados por uma operação AND em relação a esse valor e a verificação de diferente de zero.Individual permission bits can be determined by performing an AND operation against this value and checking for nonzero.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A intersecção de duas permissões é uma permissão que descreve o estado que ambas descrevem em comum.The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state that they both describe in common. Somente uma demanda que passe ambas as permissões originais passará a interseção.Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A permissão atual é um subconjunto da permissão especificada se a permissão atual especifica um conjunto de operações está totalmente contido pela permissão especificada.The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. Por exemplo, uma permissão que representa o acesso à C:\example.txt é um subconjunto de uma permissão que representa o acesso na unidade c:\\.For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. Se esse método retornar `true`, a permissão atual não representa nenhum mais acesso ao recurso protegido que tem a permissão especificada.If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Uma permissão irrestrita representa o acesso a todos os recursos protegidos pela permissão.An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O resultado de uma chamada para é uma permissão que representa todas as operações representadas pela permissão atual e a permissão especificada.The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. Qualquer demanda que passe a permissão passa seu union.Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
